caption.title: Compilation of published atmospheric pCO 2 reconstructions crossing the EOT.
caption.p: Symbols denote different proxies: circles = boron isotopes (red 4), diamonds = stomatal indices (yellow 99; dark green 100 101; pink 12), squares = alkenones (blue 5; orange 102) and triangles = diatom carbon isotopes (green). The CO 2 drawdown and minima associated with the EOT is located at 33.7–33.5 Ma in the Pearson et al. 4, Zhang et al. 102 and Heureux and Rickaby 103 records.
